name: Bayview Art Show
description: Come join us to view the showcase of a variety of talented artists and their beautiful creations. Don't miss this opportunity to immerse yourself in creativity and support local artists. See you there!

name: TRANScendTO
description:
LGBT YouthLine, the City of Toronto, and the Toronto Kiki Ballroom Alliance are partnering to bring together trans, non-binary, and 2-Spirit youth for a powerful day of learning, community, and celebration. 

Are you a Two-Spirit, Trans, and/or Non-binary youth? We'd love to have you join us for a day of connection, learning, and celebration!

What's in store?
- Engaging Workshops and Meeting Spaces: Build skills, find support, and connect with others
- Service provider fair: Browse tables to learn about gender-affirming resources from across the city 
- Free food: Because no one should learn, grow, or dance on an empty stomach! 
- Kiki Ball: Close out the day with a ballroom event – walk the runway, watch, or cheer!

name: Thursday Late Night Pride Kick-Off Party with Dance, Burlesque and Live Music
description:
Celebrate a night of queer joy as we kickstart Pride Month in Toronto, T'karonto! Featuring a curated experience of dance, burlesque and live performances.

Category is...sporty spice! Come dripped out in your athletic fits but make it zesty! Stop pining over that crush, ask them out to Pride Kick-Off. Hosted by Ms.Myles, with live sets by İdiz, Balisi and a surprise guest. Enjoy burlesque by Softservve and Joy, listen to Chissmiss Cherry x DJ Rata on decks, with P.L.U.R. in full effect.

We're asking all attendees to donate hygiene products for The 519's 2SLGBTQIA+ refugees and newcomers welcome kits.

name: How To Increase Sales Conversion For Fashion Ecommerce
description: Register before June 3rd, for an exciting 2-part webinar where you'll learn everything you need to know about increasing sales conversion for your online fashion store. Learn proven strategies to increase sales and leverage AI Fashion Photography. Join Jenn Nguyen, founder of Jenn Studio and UX designer for brands like Chanel, Calvin Klein, Tory Burch, and Canada Goose, as she shares the strategies that have helped generate over $65M in revenue. Learn how to grow your fashion ecommerce business with proven tactics and cutting-edge tools like AI—whether you're just starting or scaling up. JENN STUDIO is a consultancy specializing in designing websites, branding, mobile apps for fashion ecommerce.
image: https://secure.toronto.ca/webapps/CC/fileAPI/edc_eventcal/How To Increase Sales Conversion For Fashion Ecommerce_lFcgPzZt01SZUjjqcDk6SQ.png

name: Taste of North York
description:
Celebrate North York's vibrant cultures, diverse cuisines and community connections with delicious food vendors, live music, art, dancing, kids activities and NeighbourLink's Meet and Eat! 

Korean, Chinese, Persian, Ukrainian, South American and Indian cultures will all be represented, and net proceeds support NeighbourLink's food bank and community care programs.

name: Do West Fest 2025
description:
Toronto's start to summer, in the heart of Little Portugal! 

2025 marks the 12th anniversary of Do West Fest- a coming together of music, arts, food, fun, and community.
 
- Live music
- Extended patios
- Local food trucks and vendors
- Artisans and craft vendors
- Children's activities
- Interactive projects
- BIA member programming
- Volunteer opportunities

name: Trees Around the Branch at Kennedy/Eglinton Library

location.name: Kennedy and Eglinton Branch - Liberty Square Plaza

description: The Kennedy Eglinton Branch and its neighbourhood is home to a variety of trees. Join the City of Toronto Urban Forestry staff to explore the natural world on a local neighbourhood walk. Learn how to recognize different species and fun facts about their cultural and ecological importance. Children under 12 must be accompanied by a parent or caregiver.

organizer.name: Urban Forestry, Natural Environment and Community Programs

name: Thursday Late Night Jazz Funk Fusion Party with Kitchen Sink
description: A fusion band from Toronto, blending elements of funk, jazz, RnB and more into an upbeat, exciting experience. Their music is highly improvisational, with a focus on saxophone and guitar solos as well as high energy drum and bass playing.
